display_name: [Transcendent Light-Speed Battle Erupts] Hit & Super Saiyan God Goku

kit.leader_skill: "Accelerated Battle" or "Universe Survival Saga" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Goku and Hit's United Front (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage; A great chance of stunning the enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Transcendent Light-Speed Combo (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 4 turns; Causes mega-colossal damage; A great chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Advantage of Light Speed
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +5 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 20% up; (Forever) Attacks guaranteed to hit; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; When HP is 67% or more: Damage reduction rate 10% up; When attacking: ATK & DEF 67% up; Disables the enemy's guard; As the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn: Ki +6 and ATK & DEF 160% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 16% up; For every attack received or evaded as the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn: (Forever) ATK 20% up (up to 100%); As the 3rd attacker in a turn: Ki +7 and ATK 170% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; Interrupts the attacked enemy; For every attack performed as the 3rd attacker in a turn: (Forever) DEF 20% up (up to 100%)

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
High chance of evading enemy's attack

lines.context: When HP is 67% or more
When attacking
When attacking
As the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 16% up
lines.context: As the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn
For every attack received or evaded as the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn
As the 3rd attacker in a turn
As the 3rd attacker in a turn
As the 3rd attacker in a turn
For every attack performed as the 3rd attacker in a turn

active_skill.name: Ever-Improving Pair
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after performing 3 or more s in battle if HP is 76% or less (once only)
